author: ryanleeschneider
content: What's the thoughts on ERA including 4844 blobs?  Related to: https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/745077610685661265/1197944073911271556

author: _shemnon
content: Blobs are supposed to be transient.  A separate and purely optional file for blobs maybe, but not as part of the "permanent record" era files.
